content: Upon equipping the Plantain Fan your stamina recovery rate will moderately increase. When you activate it, you can conjure up a huge tornado that can track and immobilize enemies, dealing immense damage in the later chapters of the game, when this Vessel becomes available.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Plantain_Fan.md', within the main section titled 'Plantain Fan'.
The content is as follows:
Upon equipping the Plantain Fan your stamina recovery rate will moderately increase. When you activate it, you can conjure up a huge tornado that can track and immobilize enemies, dealing immense damage in the later chapters of the game, when this Vessel becomes available.
